attributes.action: When an election is held the party elected is done so on its mandate to govern
attributes.additional_details: Contract is grounds for dismissal under UK employment laws there for Kier starmer and his Labour government need to go effective immediately and a new election to find a replacement government should be done with immediate effect
attributes.background:
When elected that mandate becomes the contract between the elected party and the people who elected them 
The current government Kier Starmers Labour part hasn't kept to its mandate there for kier Starmers government has broken its contract between the Labour Party and the electorate 
Breach of

rejection.details:
